desc: An online 4th trimester support fashion lifestyle brand for new and veteran moms, focusing on beyond the bump. Addressing the physical, mental, and emotional changes that come with the territory of having a baby, keeping mamas looking good and feeling great offering: Apparel+Clothing Products+Services Workshops+Classes

layout.text: "Living your best mom life after baby"

SPRING/SUMMER 2022
easy fashion apparel and plant based holistic personal care products helping women *beyond the bump*
